00015 #ifndef usermagnetpsH
00016 #define usermagnetpsH
00017 
00018 #include "magnetps.h"
00019 #include "oxforddriver.h"
00020 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00021 //OXFORD PS120 Magnet Power Supply
00022 class XPS120 : public XOxfordDriver<XMagnetPS>
00023 {
00024     XNODE_OBJECT
00025 protected:
00026     XPS120(const char *name, bool runtime,
00027            const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00028            const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00029            const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00030            const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers);
00031 public:
00032     virtual ~XPS120() {}
00033 
00034 protected:
00035     virtual void toNonPersistent();
00036     virtual void toPersistent();
00037     virtual void toZero();
00038     virtual void toSetPoint();
00039     virtual double getTargetField();
00040     virtual double getSweepRate();
00041     virtual double getOutputField();
00042     virtual double getMagnetField();
00043     virtual double getPersistentField();
00044     virtual double getOutputVolt();
00045     virtual double getOutputCurrent();
00046 
00047     //! Persistent Current Switch Heater
00048     //! please return *TRUE* if no PCS fitted
00049     virtual bool isPCSHeaterOn();
00050     //! please return false if no PCS fitted
00051     virtual bool isPCSFitted();
00052   
00053     virtual double fieldResolution() {return 0.001;}
00054   
00055     virtual void setPoint(double field);
00056     virtual void setRate(double hpm);
00057 private:
00058     virtual double currentResolution() {return 0.01;}
00059     virtual double voltageResolution() {return 0.01;}
00060     
00061     void setPCSHeater(bool val) throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError&);
00062     void setActivity(int val) throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError&);
00063 };
00064 
00065 //OXFORD IPS120 Magnet Power Supply
00066 class XIPS120 : public XPS120
00067 {
00068 public:
00069     XNODE_OBJECT
00070 protected:
00071     XIPS120(const char *name, bool runtime,
00072             const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00073             const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00074             const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00075             const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00076         XPS120(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers) {}
00077 public:
00078     virtual ~XIPS120() {}
00079     virtual double fieldResolution() {return 0.0001;}
00080 protected:
00081     //! Be called just after opening interface. Call start() inside this routine appropriately.
00082     virtual void open() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &);
00083 
00084     virtual double currentResolution() {return 0.001;}
00085     virtual double voltageResolution() {return 0.001;}
00086     virtual double getTargetField();
00087     virtual double getSweepRate();
00088     virtual double getOutputField();
00089     virtual double getPersistentField();
00090     virtual double getOutputVolt();
00091     virtual double getOutputCurrent();
00092     virtual void setPoint(double field);
00093     virtual void setRate(double hpm);
00094 };

00096 #endif
